desc: Hada Story I like to think Hada Story is my way of celebrating childhood. Every day is a celebration of growth, learning and discovering new ideas. Childhood is the time where things are bright, quirky, colorful and carry a little touch of magic that can't be explained. That's what inspires each of my creations.

layout.text: Calling all of our playful minis!
The most fun jumpsuits are here!
